entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: SE 43 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy and fog. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to flurries before morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
